The question has 4 statements S1 to S4 followed by 4 conclusions in the form of options ‘a’ to ‘d’.
Identify the conclusion which logically follows from at least one of the 4 statements.
S1 : All senior schools are colleges.
S2 : No university is a play school.
S3 : Some primary schools are senior schools.
S4 : All colleges are universities.
ENGLISH.OPT1: Primary schools are not play schools.
ENGLISH.OPT2: Some senior schools are not colleges.
ENGLISH.OPT4: Some senior schools are play schools.

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: The following pie-chart shows the percentage distribution of the expenditure incurred in publishing a book. Study the pie-chart and select the correct options:
ENGLISH.OPT1: Central angle of the sector corresponding to the expenditure incurred on Royalty is 54°
ENGLISH.OPT2: If the printing cost is Rs. 30,600, then the amount of royalty will be Rs 22,950
ENGLISH.OPT3: Royalty on the book is less than the printing cost by 25%

If all are them are correct in their estimation, what is the average of different probable weights of Arun, given that Arun has integer weight?
